title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: Solving Mathematical Problems Through Systems Thinking, Creativity, and Failure Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and understanding of educational field experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design an integrated approach to solving mathematical problems using a systems thinking framework.
Learners can propose at least three alternative solution strategies for non-routine mathematical problems by applying creative thinking techniques.
Learners can improve problem-solving processes in mathematics education settings by over 80% through failure case analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
